channel.title: Working throwing knives
channel.description:
[code]if(needhelp = true) { sendMessage("pl0x o.O O.o help."); }[/code]
Can someone help me make working throwing knifes? I'm really stuck, Idk where to start..
It needs to like, Hit twice(like in rs)
Item ids:
[code]item = 863 Iron_knife item = 864 Bronze_knife item = 865 Steel_knife item = 866 Mithril_knife item = 868 Rune_knife item = 869 Black_knife[/code]
Gfx's:
[code]219-225 = throwing knives graphics[/code]
Emotes:
[code]929 - throwing knife emote[/code]
Thanks.
<3Dalcian

item.title: Working throwing knives
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’m not sure. Something along the lines of ‘battleTimer’.

Read full topic

item.title: Working throwing knives
item.dc:creator: @Dalcian Dalcian
item.description:
@Dalcian wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:6, topic:281143”][quote author=Dalcian link=topic=371260.msg2805188#msg2805188 date=1243687912]

Just work from your other range methods.

Okay, But how would I make it hit twice at a constant rate?
[/quote]
There must be a method that controls the speed of weapons.[/quote]

Hint?

I kinda forgot…

Ugh process()?

Read full topic

item.title: Working throwing knives
item.dc:creator: @Dalcian Dalcian
item.description:
@Dalcian wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:2, topic:281143”]Here’s where to start: one of your attack packets.
Something like,

if(hasThrowingKnife()) { //graphics //projectile //damage //xp //other cool stuff }[/quote]

o.O O.o to the rescue!

How would I make it hit twice?

Read full topic
